website_summaries.verdict: A premium belt that provides constant and comfortable pressure to a hernia.
pros: Easy to fit the belt around the hips
Over-the-brief style ensures you can wear the belt comfortably underneath clothing
Does not contain any metal parts, which means you won't have to worry about the belt setting off scanners when you travel
Intended for those who are dealing with an ostomy
cons: Pricey in comparison to similar hernia belts

customer_reviews.title: Good as can be.  A real help
customer_reviews.text: Really Does help and is as comfortable and confident as it could be I suppose. Still no sezy fun but let's me work all day
customer_reviews.author: robert mcconnell

customer_reviews.title: Helped relieve his pain so he could work
customer_reviews.text: With his surgery over a week away this belt was a godsend! He was able to continue to work and not be in pain.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Myers

customer_reviews.title: great relief, avoiding VA surgery  :-(
customer_reviews.text: Very good product. Sizes are dicey. But I even bought a second one because the VA Hospital has me on a 3 month waiting list for the surgical correction. Or until I get help elsewhere. Takes the pressure off of me on several counts. Once again, thanks VA (not!).
customer_reviews.author: BobG

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This was a life saver! Was able to remain active while awaiting hernia repair surgery.
customer_reviews.author: David G. Swatzler

customer_reviews.title: A good deal
customer_reviews.text: The belt met all my expectations and then some. The fit is good and it works as advertised. This testimonial is coming from Gayle's husband, KC
customer_reviews.author: GAYLE PATRICIA KEFFER

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The hernia belt relieved my son's pain. He even used it after his surgery.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia A Hopkins

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Hernia Belt
customer_reviews.text: Helpful and as advertised, Good description. Got it for my uncle. Now he is able to get around comfortably. He says it is like night and day.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Reis

customer_reviews.title: Hernia belt
customer_reviews.text: From the description, I thought they would be soft, flexible and easy to use. They're better suited for use by men - wearing them over undergarments makes elimination difficult for women and would require opening and closing the strap while standing. They're quite heavy, stiff and uncomfortable so I'll be donating them. I designed a belt that's easier to use, very lightweight, washable, flexible and much less expensive should I decide to use one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: The package said left side but looks to me is the right side. Don't know how to use it. Waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Tang

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my partner since he had a hernia that was acting up and could not afford the surgery ($10 grand with no insurance--not gonna happen). He says it works great and wears it most days at work where he often lifts heavy things and is constantly bending and on his feet. It's not a permanent solution, of course, but it has been a lifesaver for him until he can afford think about surgery (probably a long time from now). He wears it sometimes with and sometimes without the foam piece depending on the type of support he needs.
customer_reviews.author: Olive Z.

customer_reviews.title: I have use another brand of Truss for about a year and it helped but nothing like this, it is made in Germany and of ...
customer_reviews.text: This this has literally saved my life! I have use another brand of Truss for about a year and it helped but nothing like this, it is made in Germany and of the highest quality. Best of all you can sit down with it, something I couldn't do with the other kind because it squished your stomach and groin so bad that you had to un-velcro it while sitting down. This belt hold the hernia in place so well that you almost forget you have one! Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Laserboy

customer_reviews.title: Very helpful product
customer_reviews.text: I bought it at my doctor's recommendation. Very helpful product, especially since I carry moderately heavy objects throughout the day. I no longer have those painful episodes. I will still wear even after my surgery to avoid further complications. It gets tight at times and barely moves during a day of activities.
customer_reviews.author: Joe 1015

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t like it
customer_reviews.text: Before my surgery this did not keep my hernia in and actually it was a little painful. It did not work for me
customer_reviews.author: Youtube-Matt-Tube

customer_reviews.title: It helps but Velcro does not last more than 2 months
customer_reviews.text: It works, however Velcro like strips wear out over time like in 2 months of opening and closing more than once a day for obvious reasons of necessity! Hello?
customer_reviews.author: amazonbuyerforever

customer_reviews.title: This helps!
customer_reviews.text: It helps, but I wish it could be a little more comfortable and form-fitting.
customer_reviews.author: elam

customer_reviews.title: Women buy 2 sizes larger - measured small for men's hips!!
customer_reviews.text: Buyer (women) take note - I took too long to return, so I'll see if someone I know can use it, but make sure you get a MUCH larger size than you are told from the description. I wrongly assumed that the size was for waist, but it is apparently for hip, and leans on the small side. So my small barely went over my thigh. There are very few hernia aids made for women, which is odd as we get a lot of them according to stats...so, make sure you go up 2 sizes, and you can adjust down but not up!!
customer_reviews.author: Julia Sutherland

customer_reviews.title: uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: uncomfortable and hard to know if its doing any good
customer_reviews.author: ejsunny

product_meta.title: Meditex Left Side Inguinal Groin Hernia Belt - Small
product_meta.description: Size:Left - S (26-30)Meditex Inguinal Groin Hernia Belt contains a soft pad that applies gradual pressure and support to the weakened muscles of the groin with focused compression on the hernia. The inguinal hernia belt is designed to provide relief from a reducible inguinal hernia - post or pre-surgery. Will provide you with the support and comfort needed to maintain your active lifestyle. Can be used while swimming or showering. The belt has no metal parts which eliminates any potential embarrassment when going through scanners when traveling.
feature_bullets: Meditex Inguinal Groin Hernia Belt contains a soft pad that applies gradual pressure and support to the weakened muscles of the groin with focused compression on the hernia
Provides constant, comfortable and adjustable pressure to the hernia
Measure around the hips for sizing; waist size is generally not a proper measurement as the belt sits below the waist line
Over-the-brief style of hernia support, worn inconspicuously under clothing - may be used while showering or swimming
